languages.text: Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Архетипы служат путями развития, которым следуют ваши персонажи. Каждый архетип включает в себя уникальный набор навыков и экспертиз, а также представляет собой определенную боевую специализацию: от воина на передовой до незаменимого офицера, предпочитающего командовать из глубокого тыла. Только вам выбирать, кем быть в темном будущем Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Doctrines are development paths that your characters follow. Each doctrine encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer: 40,000 Rogue Trader.

Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Архетипы служат путями развития, которым следуют ваши персонажи. Каждый архетип включает в себя уникальный набор навыков и экспертиз, а также представляет собой определенную боевую специализацию: от воина на передовой до незаменимого офицера, предпочитающего командовать из глубокого тыла. Только вам выбирать, кем быть в темном будущем Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 职业代表您的角色的职业发展路径。每种职业都代表战斗中的某个特定角色，包含独一无二的技能与专业战斗能力，从前线冲锋陷阵的战士，到后方指挥队伍的军官不一而足。您可以在《战锤40000：行商浪人》这个严峻而黑暗的世界中，选择您想成为的角色。
languages.original_text: Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 职业代表您的角色的职业发展路径。每种职业都代表战斗中的某个特定角色，包含独一无二的技能与专业战斗能力，从前线冲锋陷阵的战士，到后方指挥队伍的军官不一而足。您可以在《战锤40000：行商浪人》这个严峻而黑暗的世界中，选择您想成为的角色。

languages.text: タイプはキャラクターが進む成長の道である。それぞれのタイプは特有のスキルと専門知識を含み、最前線の兵士や後方から指令を出す必要不可欠なリーダーといった、特定の戦闘専門性を表しています。『Warhammer: 40,000 Rogue Trader』のおぞましい暗黒の未来において、あなたがなりたい者を選んでください。
languages.original_text: Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: タイプはキャラクターが進む成長の道である。それぞれのタイプは特有のスキルと専門知識を含み、最前線の兵士や後方から指令を出す必要不可欠なリーダーといった、特定の戦闘専門性を表しています。『Warhammer: 40,000 Rogue Trader』のおぞましい暗黒の未来において、あなたがなりたい者を選んでください。

languages.text: Los arquetipos son sendas de desarrollo que siguen tus personajes. Cada arquetipo contiene una combinación única de habilidades y representa una especialización concreta en combate, desde el guerrero de vanguardia al líder indispensable que da órdenes desde la retaguardia. Elige quién quieres ser en el futuro despiadado de Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Las doctrinas son sendas de desarrollo que siguen tus personajes. Cada doctrina contiene una combinación única de habilidades y representa una especialización concreta en combate, desde el guerrero de vanguardia al líder indispensable que da órdenes desde la retaguardia. Elige quién quieres ser en el futuro despiadado de Warhammer: 40,000 Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Archetypen sind Entwicklungspfade, denen deine Charaktere folgen. Jeder Archetyp beinhaltet einen einzigartigen Satz an Fertigkeiten und Kompetenzen und repräsentiert eine bestimmte Kampfspezialisierung, vom Krieger an der Front bis hin zum unverzichtbaren Anführer, der lieber von hinten Befehle gibt. Wähle, wer du in der düsteren Zukunft von Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader sein möchtest.
languages.original_text: Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Doktrinen sind Entwicklungspfade, denen deine Charaktere folgen. Jede Doktrin beinhaltet einen einzigartigen Satz an Fertigkeiten und Kompetenzen und repräsentiert eine bestimmte Kampfspezialisierung, vom Krieger an der Front bis hin zum unverzichtbaren Anführer, der lieber von hinten Befehle gibt. Wähle, wer du in der düsteren Zukunft von Warhammer: 40,000 Rogue Trader sein möchtest.

languages.text: Les archétypes sont des parcours de progression que suivent vos personnages. Chaque archétype propose un ensemble spécifique de compétences et d'expertise, et représente une spécialisation de combat, du guerrier de première ligne au leader indispensable préférant commander depuis l'arrière. Choisissez qui vous souhaitez incarner dans le ténébreux futur de Warhammer: 40,000 Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Archetypes are development paths that your characters follow. Each archetype encapsulates a unique set of skills and expertise and represents a specific combat specialisation, from the front-line warrior to the indispensable leader preferring to command from the rear. Choose who you want to be in the grim dark future of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Les doctrines sont des parcours d'acquisition que suivent vos personnages. Chaque doctrine englobe un ensemble spécifique de compétences et d'expertise, et représente une spécialisation de combat, du guerrier de première ligne au leader indispensable préférant commander depuis l'arrière. Choisissez qui vous souhaitez incarner dans le ténébreux futur de Warhammer: 40,000 Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Arketipler, karakterlerinin izleyeceği gelişim yollarıdır. Her arketip, eşsiz birer beceri ve uzmanlık kümesini kapsar. Cephede göğüs göğüse çarpışan savaşçıdan geri hattan komuta etmeyi yeğleyen vazgeçilmez öndere kadar her biri belirli bir çatışma usulünde ihtisaslaşmayı temsil eder. Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader'ın acımasız karanlık geleceğinde kim olacağını seç.
